name: konohASCII
description:
Beware! here comes uzumASCII!

The Sound Ninjas took over the forest, which leads the Genin's to the Chunin Arena. It's up to uzumASCII, to clear the path of the once safe and calm path to the Arena. This is an epic Battle between wits and ASCII codes...?

It's your Ninja way!

Hone your Ninja skills, but be careful, never underastimate,  Always be on your toes. Learn from your mistakes, and adapt to the occuring situations. On your path you meet a number of deadly, and dangerous enemies. uzumASCII will not go defenseless! uzumASCII can perfom the famous Shadow Clone Jutsu, with a combination of handseals, throw deadly kunai's and also perform taijutsu.

Jirobo, Sound chuunin, Orochimaru's bodyguard. 
Zaku Abumi, Sound Chuunin, The sound four's captain.
Yoroi Akado, Secretly an agent for Orochimaru, The sound four's intel.
